TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit RefreshSharingFolderType extends ExchangeWebServices.BaseRequestType

summary.span: 类表示的请求刷新指定的本地文件夹中的共享的数据。

span.span: The class represents a request to refresh shared data in the specified local folder.

span.para: 下面的代码示例演示如何刷新使用中的共享文件夹的最新数据指定的本地文件夹。本示例中，IdOfLocalFolder 是对象，用于标识要刷新的本地文件夹。

The following code example shows you how to refresh the specified local folder with the latest data from the folder that is being shared. In this example, IdOfLocalFolder is the object that identifies the local folder that is to be refreshed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 构造函数初始化的新实例类。

span.span: The constructor initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property ExchangeWebServices::FolderIdType ^ SharingFolderId { ExchangeWebServices::FolderIdType ^ get(); void set(ExchangeWebServices::FolderIdType ^ value); };

summary.span: 属性获取或设置标识的本地文件夹中的共享的关系的对象。

span.span: The property gets or sets a object that identifies the local folder in a sharing relationship.

value.span: 值属性是标识的本地文件夹中的共享的关系的对象。

span.span: The value of the property is a object that identifies the local folder in a sharing relationship.
